instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3023-A  Keyboard and track pad work for about 5 min then just stop.
threads.message:
computer came in as trackpad and keyboard stopped working. during testing the computer worked fine booted into option and trackpad works.  load osx and after about 2 min or so the trackpad and keyboard go missing and it asked for me to connect a bluetooth keyboard.  i have tested it several times. 
any ideas?  thanks

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3023-A  Keyboard and track pad work for about 5 min then just stop.
threads.message: Corrosion on trackpad cable and/or connector.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3023-A  Keyboard and track pad work for about 5 min then just stop.
threads.message:
awesome, i was expecting water damage on this computer but did not see any. after looking at the track pad area under the scope though i found liquid damage no corrosion. so i swapped the trackpad out and everything's good. 
Thanks again for the help duke!  words cannot express how much i appreciate Louis & your help.  Another happy customer down! :)
